description:
Despite Matakara`s efforts, the fight between Kenichiro and Marito begins. Taking advantage of their position, the NG BOYS enter the battle between Minato Kai and Siguma Squad. How will the war end, and what will happen to Arajin and Senya`s training?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Une amitié débordante ! Révolution de ciboule !
Yuujou Mashi Mashi! Nira Liver Lution 21!
友情マシマシ! ニラレバリューション21!
